price: He said, “There is no blame on you today. May Allah forgive you, for He is the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
